name: GMTK Pop It
description:
I started on Saturday at 11pm so this is what you get lmao.

VERY UNFINISHED. INSTRUCTIONS:

WASD to move. Space to jump. Shift to slam. You need to slam on tiles in order to earn points.

---------------------------------------------------

Ideally, this would've been a multiplayer coop game, but I was unable to get it to work before the deadline.

I'll be updating the game once the jam voting ends. I had to upload just what I had despite huge flaws. I began the upload and pressed submit around 7 minutes before the deadline. I'm updating the description past the deadline. The game has now been uploaded right at the deadline time.

Since I was messing with local multiplayer for the first time I janked up the code for properly spawning controllers and possessing pawns. Ideally, players would assign controllers or controls on the main menu screen and then start the game. However, this just won't work in the current build.
